document_data.caption: Tyr with Justicar in hand.
document_data.name: ''Justicar''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Justicar''''', also referred to as '''''Justiciar''''', was the powerful [[enchanted]] [[longsword]] wielded by the god of justice, [[Tyr]].Tyr's sword is not actually named Justicar/Justiciar in ''Faiths & Avatars'', but it is presumed to be the same sword and is included here.
document_data.History:
It was gifted to him either by [[Ao]] or Tyr's predecessor. [[Mystra]] aided in its creation.

After Tyr's death, which occurred while fighting off a demonic invasion of [[Celestia]] during the [[Era of Upheaval]], the sword was stuck in a white stone in the heart of [[Martyrdom]], [[Ilmater]]'s [[divine realm]] in [[Celestia]].
document_data.Abilities: ''Justicar'' was a +3 ''[[sword of sharpness]]'' that could enable the wielder to [[discern lies|sense lies]], [[know alignment|know a being's alignment]], and [[see invisibility|see invisible things]]. or a ''+5 [[vorpal]] longsword''.
